I've heard alot of good things about this show so i thought i was going to give it a shot. But on tv tome it is said that it should be 15 episodes, and i only have 13 episodes and two extras... Is this correct? I was thinking that maybe there are some double episodes? 

But my last episode are e13 Heart of Gold while on tv tome, e15 The Message are the last one...
"Objects in Space" is the final episode when they are in the right order. There are 14 episodes, one of which is a pilot of twice the normal length. This often counts as two episodes.
So only download that ep then. (You just need a client like Azureus where you can choose what files to download.)
Well, if that's the case im still missing one episode and that would actually be objects in space...
this does have all the episodes 1-14. Remember, though, buy the dvd is you like it and support a great franchise!

I am truly amazed this is still floating around.  I'm 99% sure this was my rip from  Dec '03.  I wasn't all that proud of it.  It was my first official rip.  The subtitles were released as a separate torrent if memory serves me correctly.  Anyone know where that is?  I wrote the "corrections nfo" because I was all confused with the tv.com ep list and the dvd ep list.  Anyhoo great show keep seeding it forever cause it makes me feel warm and fuzzy.

Such a shame this show was cancelled.
